Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Tomb Raider: Directed by Roar Uthaug. With Alicia Vikander, Dominic West, Walton Goggins, Daniel Wu. Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1365519/","name":"Tomb Raider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY4NDcyZGQtYmVlNy00ODgwLTljYTMtYzQ2OTE3NDhjODMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYzODM3Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1365519/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"VoyagerMN1986"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Croft made for an infantilized generation -- Signature pistols now a bad thing?","reviewBody":"Seriously this is like some kind of 1930's soviet world where all of a sudden people start getting cropped out of photos. Laura Croft without her signature pistols is absurd. I have no trouble with Vikander, she is a great actor. but having her, with an unsighted composite bow (!), make bow shots that are impossible at 1/10 the range, treats the audience like idiots. Seriously this film does not merely require that you suspend disbelief, it is a fight film which requires that: a) you know nothing whatsoever about fighting and b) that you have an IQ below 80. (hence all the "8" through "10" star reviews by people so dumb that they think we can't see their only account activity is to upshill this stinker!)"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201436,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-03-14","keywords":"clasp knife,based on video game,chase,female protagonist,jungle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3590174745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ3MDc2N2MtZmU4OC00ZDVhLTgxMjUtNzVkYTk4NjkzM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ3MDc2N2MtZmU4OC00ZDVhLTgxMjUtNzVkYTk4NjkzM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922035/","name":"Dominic West"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0324658/","name":"Walton Goggins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012385/","name":"Roar Uthaug"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4039044/","name":"Geneva Robertson-Dworet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3322414/","name":"Alastair Siddons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2489193/","name":"Evan Daugherty"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ocean's Eight
Oceanovih 8
programme.desc:
Ocean's Eight: Directed by Gary Ross. With Sandra Bullock, Griffin Dunne, Deidre Goodwin, Daniella Rabbani. Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5164214/","name":"Ocean's Eight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDEyMzc4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjEzNjM0NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5164214/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"charlie-krausse"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"8 lacks the wit, brilliance, pace, style & sophistication as 11 & 13","reviewBody":"The wit, brilliance, pace and style the audience loved from Ocean's 11 and then again in Ocean's 13 is what brought us to Ocean's 8. Unfortunately, it was closer to Ocean's 12. Sister to Danny, Debbie Ocean leaves prison on parole only to find herself immediately recruiting to pull off a jewel heist from the Met Gala. 

The movie opens with an opening plot twist and then closes with the same, leaving you wondering if it is indeed true. 

Compared to the the Vegas Ocean movies, this movie lacked everything that made those two special. 8 was predictable, slow and presented no style or sophistication. And that's sad because Bullock and Hathaway played their characters to the best of the script. IMDb data; ttnr: 5164214, Title: Ocean's Eight, --- Description: Ocean's Eight: Directed by Gary Ross. With Sandra Bullock, Griffin Dunne, Deidre Goodwin, Daniella Rabbani. Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5164214/","name":"Ocean's Eight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDEyMzc4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjEzNjM0NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5164214/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"charlie-krausse","dateCreated":"2018-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"8 lacks the wit, brilliance, pace, style & sophistication as 11 & 13","reviewBody":"The wit, brilliance, pace and style the audience loved from Ocean's 11 and then again in Ocean's 13 is what brought us to Ocean's 8. Unfortunately, it was closer to Ocean's 12. Sister to Danny, Debbie Ocean leaves prison on parole only to find herself immediately recruiting to pull off a jewel heist from the Met Gala. 

The movie opens with an opening plot twist and then closes with the same, leaving you wondering if it is indeed true. 

Compared to the the Vegas Ocean movies, this movie lacked everything that made those two special. 8 was predictable, slow and presented no style or sophistication. And that's sad because Bullock and Hathaway played their characters to the best of the script. Even with two cameo's this movie didn't make the heist.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":200818,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-06-08","keywords":"released from jail,female protagonist,hacker,vomiting,diamond necklace","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1135459097","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI1YTI3Y2UtNTRmNy00OWNiLWJjOTQtMjU3ZWFlNzIzNjVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWZlZGVyaWdh._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI1YTI3Y2UtNTRmNy00OWNiLWJjOTQtMjU3ZWFlNzIzNjVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWZlZGVyaWdh._V1_.jpg","description":"Debbie Ocean gathers a crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002657/","name":"Gary Ross"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702052/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002657/","name":"Gary Ross","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6035700/","name":"Olivia Milch","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425138/","name":"George Clayton Johnson"],"duration":"PT1H50M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Potomci
programme.desc: Nakon što škola Salvatore naiđe na financijske teškoće, Lizzie predlaže da održe svoje prvo prikupljanje sredstava. Nakon što škola Salvatore naiđe na financijske teškoće, Lizzie predlaže da održe svoje prvo prikupljanje sredstava. Dok Alaric pokušava riješiti probleme s bankom, on zadužuje Kaleba da nadzire događaje u školi. Drugdje, Cleo pomaže Hope da se nosi sa svojim osjećajima, dok M. G. traži pomoć od Alysse. Napokon, kad se u školi pojavi leprekon, možda im upravo on treba da im se nasmiješi sreća.

programme.title: Legacies
Potomci
programme.desc: Legacies: Created by Julie Plec. With Danielle Rose Russell, Aria Shahghasemi, Quincy Fouse, Matthew Davis. Hope Mikaelson, a tribrid daughter of a Vampire/Werewolf hybrid, makes her way in the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8103070/","name":"Legacies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMwNDczMDUtNDU0Mi00MjIyLWI1NTktNzM4Yzc1MTNmZDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQ0NTEzMzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hope Mikaelson, a tribrid daughter of a Vampire/Werewolf hybrid, makes her way in the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8103070/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahmorris-58851"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Doesn't compare to TVD or TO","reviewBody":"Legacies isn't horrible but it's definitely for a younger audience. You might as well deal with the pain once you finish TVD and TO and move on rather than cling to this last ounce of hope (haha). This show had so much more potential that was pretty much ignored. It adds in tons of mythical creatures which could've been interesting only they made it so immature. It's honestly as if the writer became a middle schooler over night. Another thing is the acting. I'm sorry but other than (Obviously Rick) Josie, Lizzie, Landon, and Hope (who can be a stretch most times) , the actors and actresses either have little talent or are not given the platform to properly present their talent. I think we all had high expectations to which few were met. I'm so disappointed to be saying this and truly wish it were different, but don't waste your time unless you have nothing else to do.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23148,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-10-25","keywords":"vampire,witch,high school,spin off,sequel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5994559/","name":"Danielle Rose Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7263948/","name":"Aria Shahghasemi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7875835/","name":"Quincy Fouse"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0429120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0687096/","name":"Julie Plec"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1546109209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI2MDQzOTUtYzA2Yy00OTg1LWEyMGEtN2I3ZWViNzAyOTBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI2MDQzOTUtYzA2Yy00OTg1LWEyMGEtN2I3ZWViNzAyOTBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"The show centers around Hope Mikaelson, the vampire-witch-werewolf hybrid daughter of Hayley Marshall-Kenner and Klaus Mikaelson, and her time at a school for the supernatural called The Salvatore School for the Young and Gifted."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tomb Raider
Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Tomb Raider: Directed by Roar Uthaug. With Alicia Vikander, Dominic West, Walton Goggins, Daniel Wu. Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1365519/","name":"Tomb Raider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY4NDcyZGQtYmVlNy00ODgwLTljYTMtYzQ2OTE3NDhjODMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYzODM3Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1365519/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"VoyagerMN1986"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Croft made for an infantilized generation -- Signature pistols now a bad thing?","reviewBody":"Seriously this is like some kind of 1930's soviet world where all of a sudden people start getting cropped out of photos. Laura Croft without her signature pistols is absurd. I have no trouble with Vikander, she is a great actor. but having her, with an unsighted composite bow (!), make bow shots that are impossible at 1/10 the range, treats the audience like idiots. Seriously this film does not merely require that you suspend disbelief, it is a fight film which requires that: a) you know nothing whatsoever about fighting and b) that you have an IQ below 80. (hence all the "8" through "10" star reviews by people so dumb that they think we can't see their only account activity is to upshill this stinker!)"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201436,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-03-14","keywords":"clasp knife,based on video game,chase,female protagonist,jungle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3590174745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ3MDc2N2MtZmU4OC00ZDVhLTgxMjUtNzVkYTk4NjkzM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ3MDc2N2MtZmU4OC00ZDVhLTgxMjUtNzVkYTk4NjkzM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922035/","name":"Dominic West"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0324658/","name":"Walton Goggins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012385/","name":"Roar Uthaug"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4039044/","name":"Geneva Robertson-Dworet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3322414/","name":"Alastair Siddons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2489193/","name":"Evan Daugherty"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fahrenheit 451
Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc:
Fahrenheit 451: Directed by Ramin Bahrani. With Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Cindy Katz, Michael Shannon. In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0360556/","name":"Fahrenheit 451","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZGJkZDgtNzBlNS00YjkyLTk3NGEtZTIxMGVkMTk2Yjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0360556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Prismark10"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Book burners","reviewBody":"I found Francois Truffaut's film version of Fahrenheit 451 hard going, not helped by a distant performance from star Oskar Werner.

Ramin Bahrani reimagines the Ray Bradbury novel. He sets it in an era of fake news, fake history, disinformation. Propaganda at its best. Burn books and you can reinvent an alternative timeline.

Set in a future Dystopia, Guy Montag (Michael P Jordan) and his mentor Captain Beatty (Michael Shannon) are firemen after a second civil war America who burn books, a tradition that goes far back as Benjamin Franklin! It is easier to control people if they could not find information and think for themselves. It was easy to keep people happy if they do not get offended from what they read.

Montag carries out his work diligently and is in line for promotion but gets taken in by the Eels, a counter group who preserve the information contained in books. They learn books by heart, the upload it on the net, they rebel against the government.

Shannon can play the villain in his sleep. Jordan has the harder part but he is rather vacuous, maybe he is meant to be that way, a person who has never learned to think or question for himself.

There are some good ideas in this film but they never hang together or are fully realised. With two failed adaptations, I think Bradbury's novel might come across better on the page than on the screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18874,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-20","keywords":"dystopia,book burning,flamethrower,emoji,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young girl...and begins to rebel against society."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. Jordan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2210323/","name":"Aaron Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441654/","name":"Cindy Katz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1023919/","name":"Ramin Bahrani"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0618269/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001969/","name":"Ray Bradbury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1023919/","name":"Ramin Bahrani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0618881/","name":"Amir Naderi"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0360556, Title: Fahrenheit 451, --- Description: Fahrenheit 451: Directed by Ramin Bahrani. With Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Cindy Katz, Michael Shannon. In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0360556/","name":"Fahrenheit 451","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZGJkZDgtNzBlNS00YjkyLTk3NGEtZTIxMGVkMTk2Yjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0360556/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Prismark10","dateCreated":"2018-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Book burners","reviewBody":"I found Francois Truffaut's film version of Fahrenheit 451 hard going, not helped by a distant performance from star Oskar Werner.

Ramin Bahrani reimagines the Ray Bradbury novel. He sets it in an era of fake news, fake history, disinformation. Propaganda at its best. Burn books and you can reinvent an alternative timeline.

Set in a future Dystopia, Guy Montag (Michael P Jordan) and his mentor Captain Beatty (Michael Shannon) are firemen after a second civil war America who burn books, a tradition that goes far back as Benjamin Franklin! It is easier to control people if they could not find information and think for themselves. It was easy to keep people happy if they do not get offended from what they read.

Montag carries out his work diligently and is in line for promotion but gets taken in by the Eels, a counter group who preserve the information contained in books. They learn books by heart, the upload it on the net, they rebel against the government.

Shannon can play the villain in his sleep. Jordan has the harder part but he is rather vacuous, maybe he is meant to be that way, a person who has never learned to think or question for himself.

There are some good ideas in this film but they never hang together or are fully realised. With two failed adaptations, I think Bradbury's novel might come across better on the page than on the screen.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18874,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-20","keywords":"dystopia,book burning,flamethrower,emoji,based on novel","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young girl...and begins to rebel against society.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7374926/","name":"Proxima","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjkxOTc2M2ItODI4ZC00ZDVmLTg1ZGMtMDczNTYyNzg4Nzk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7374926/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"random-70778"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Heavy on melodrama, not much else","reviewBody":"I have to say I went in optimistic and left disappointed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6537,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-27","keywords":"female astronaut,male astronaut,mother daughter relationship,cat,swimming pool","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2393030169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzZTI0MGEtNzQ3Yy00MTdjLWIyZTYtNjZmYTU0ZWViMGI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzZTI0MGEtNzQ3Yy00MTdjLWIyZTYtNjZmYTU0ZWViMGI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Eva Green gives a career best performance in this epic and emotionally charged new drama from acclaimed director Alice Winocour. Green plays Sarah, a French astronaut training at the European Space Agency in Cologne. The only woman in the arduous programme she has been chosen to be part of the crew of a year-long space mission called ‘Proxima’. Putting enormous strain on her relationship with her daughter (played by outstanding newcomer Zélie Boulant-Lemesle), the training begins to take its toll on both as Sarah’s training progresses and the launch looms ever closer."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5541157/","name":"Zélie Boulant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1356951/","name":"Alice Winocour"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091516/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0401721/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1356951/","name":"Alice Winocour"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111379/","name":"Jean-Stéphane Bron"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

With her unique abilities and a posse of dysfunctional allies, she's the only thing that can bring the paranormal to justice.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4878326/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marlisajemison"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Everyone's already said it....","reviewBody":"I have nothing new to add in this review that someone hasn't already said: fantastic show with a rough start. I almost stopped watching because a lot of ppl said they liked it after the pilot but I didn't like it until episode 4. After rewatching, it's not that the first 3 episodes are bad, it's that they're slow and are almost purely for building the world and characters, rather than really advancing much plot. That being said, the plot that they start with is rather jarring to try to jump into even with the background information they give, because they dole a lot out of out piece by piece or rather episode by episode. The special effects are definitely cheesy, but you get used to them pretty quick and they don't negate from the amazing writing. The characters trade witty barbs like it's currency and that's what really made me love it along with the clearly concerted effort to have a diverse cast without making it look like it was a legal requirement. If you're a fan of Buffy, Lost Girl, or Supernatural then you should give this a real chance and I can almost guarantee you'll enjoy it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21180,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2016-04-01","keywords":"based on comic,lesbian,lesbian relationship,idw comics,wyatt earp","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234276/","name":"Melanie Scrofano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747653/","name":"Tim Rozon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3176450/","name":"Dominique Provost-Chalkley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176154/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0202933/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wynonna Earp Season Two","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi16366361","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDFkZGM5ZWEtZTIwMy00NjUzLWI1MjktNDg4ZDQ3NzJmOTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDFkZGM5ZWEtZTIwMy00NjUzLWI1MjktNDg4ZDQ3NzJmOTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Everyone has demons, but hers are real."}}</script><metacontent="
